name: Astron?ka
description: Astron?ka is a farming simulation game. Creatures from a remote star system cultivate vegetables in a futuristic environment. The player controls these creatures in various levels, completing puzzles in order to care for and gather the vegetables and win vegetable contests. The ultimate goal is to win the All-Universe Vegetable Competition.
alsoFor: PlayStation 3, PSP, PS Vita | Combined View
